name: JusticIA (Cursed Files)
description:
Play as a Judge in a dystopic future where the judicial system has been replaced by Artificial Intelligence. Your mission is to read through the arrest details of suspects and deliver the final verdict choosing between freeing, jailing or executing.

JusticIA was originally developed in 48 hours for ZJam 2019, and has been tweaked  and translated  in an additional ~ 8 hours of work to better represent the original concept.
